decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and access statement, location plan. Received: 13th October 2016.
Section Rev 03, existing/ proposed elevations and sections sheet 2 and existing/ proposed floor plans and block plan sheet 01. Received: 8th November 2016 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building. The dormer shall be clad in roof tiles to match the roof tiles of the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extensions hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the flat above 3 Shelson Parade, Ashford Road, TW13 4QZ,  and the roof space shall not at any time be used as a separate self-contained residential unit.
Condition : 6 - The windows formed in dormer to the side roof slope shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a side and rear roof extension incorporating two front roof windows.
